manglik.description: Mars in houses 1,2,4,7,8,12 from Ascendant or Moon => Manglik Dosha
manglik.rule: If Mars is placed in houses 1, 2, 4, 7, 8, or 12 from the Ascendant (Lagna) or Moon, the native is considered Manglik.
manglik.significance: Manglik Dosha is traditionally believed to create obstacles in marriage and requires careful consideration in compatibility.

moon_sign.description: Determine Rashi (sign) by Moon longitude. Each rashi spans 30°.
moon_sign.rule: Moon longitude / 30 = Rashi index. Aries (0-30°), Taurus (30-60°), ... Pisces (330-360°)
moon_sign.significance: The Moon sign (Rashi) represents emotional nature, inner self, and mental disposition.

vimshottari.description: Vimshottari Dasha system based on Moon nakshatra at birth. 120-year cycle divided into 9 periods.
vimshottari.rule: Moon's nakshatra at birth determines starting dasha lord. Each nakshatra is 13°20' (360°/27).
vimshottari.significance: Vimshottari Dasha predicts major life periods and timing of events. Current dasha determines overall theme of life events.

ascendant.description: Ascendant (Lagna) is the zodiacal sign rising on the eastern horizon at birth.
ascendant.calculation: Computed using Swiss Ephemeris with Placidus house system.
ascendant.significance: The Ascendant represents the physical appearance, personality, and outer demeanor.

houses.description: 12 houses represent different life areas. Each house = 30° using simple house system.

note: All calculations use real ephemeris data from Swiss Ephemeris library. For educational purposes.
